mapper.select: select t.TEMPLATE_ID TemplateId, t.TEMPLATE_NAME TemplateName from HR_SALARY_TEMPLATE t where t.IS_GLOBAL=1

select t1.ITEM_EIDTABLE Editable,t.ITEM_ID ItemId,t.Parent_ID ParentId, t.ITEM_TITLE ItemCaption,t.ISLEAF from HR_SALARY_TEMPLATE_ITEM t1 inner join HR_SALARY_ITEM t on t.ITEM_ID=t1.ITEM_ID where t1.TEMPLATE_ID=#{value} order by t.ITEM_CODE

select t1.PERSON_ID PersonId,t1.ITEM_ID ItemId,sum(t1.ITEM_VALUE) PayValue from HR_EMPLOYEE t INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t1 on t1.PERSON_ID=t.PERSON_ID where t.COMPANY_ID=${CompanyId} and t1.PAY_MONTH='${PayMonth}' GROUP BY t1.PERSON_ID,t1.ITEM_ID union select t1.PERSON_ID PersonId,4 ItemId,sum(t1.ITEM_CMP_VALUE) PayValue from HR_EMPLOYEE t INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t1 on t1.PERSON_ID=t.PERSON_ID where t.COMPANY_ID=${CompanyId} and t1.PAY_MONTH='${PayMonth}' and t1.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205) GROUP BY t1.PERSON_ID union select t1.PERSON_ID PersonId,5 ItemId,sum(t1.ITEM_CMP_VALUE) PayValue from HR_EMPLOYEE t INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t1 on t1.PERSON_ID=t.PERSON_ID where t.COMPANY_ID=${CompanyId} and t1.PAY_MONTH='${PayMonth}' and t1.ITEM_ID in (206) GROUP BY t1.PERSON_ID

select t1.ITEM_EIDTABLE Editable,t.ITEM_ID ItemId,t.Parent_ID ParentId, t.ITEM_TITLE ItemCaption,t.ISLEAF from HR_SALARY_PAY_ITEM t1 inner join HR_SALARY_ITEM t on t.ITEM_ID=t1.ITEM_ID where t1.PAY_ID=#{value} order by t.ITEM_CODE

select t.PERSON_ID objectId,t.CARD_ID ObjectCode,t.PERSON_NAME ObjectName from HR_EMPLOYEE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_OBJECT t1 on t1.PERSON_ID=t.PERSON_ID where t1.PAY_ID=#{value} order by t.PERSON_ID
mapper.update: update HR_SALARY_PAY set PAY_TITLE=#{PayTitle} where PAY_ID=#{PayId};
update HR_SALARY_PAY set STATUS=#{Status} where PAY_ID=#{PayId};
